content.html: “We don’t have time to focus on the internal developer experience yet, we’ll do so later”. “Code review just slows us down” “Why upgrade your dependencies if things are working fine?” “I just want to upgrade this one dependency but not depending on it”
content.value:
“We don’t have time to focus on the internal developer experience yet, we’ll do so later”.

“Code review just slows us down”

“Why upgrade your dependencies if things are working fine?”

“I just want to upgrade this one dependency but not depending on it”
